message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.NA, cs.SC, cs.Distributed and Parallel Computing. 

The paper discusses the performance of a distributed N-body simulation on supercomputers across the globe, which involves parallel computing and distributed computing. Therefore, cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category. 

The paper also discusses the technical feasibility of using widely distributed supercomputers, which involves computer engineering and architecture, making cs.CE (Computer Engineering) another likely category. 

The simulation involves numerical analysis and optimization, making cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) a possible category. 

The paper also discusses the scheduling and reservation policies of local supercomputers, which involves system and control theory, making cs.SC (Systems and Control) a possible category. 

Finally, the paper discusses the use of distributed computing for the simulation, making cs.Distributed and Parallel Computing a possible category.
